resources.string: Want to sell something that you do not need anymore? \n Or want to buy used products at a low price? \n Ask the community

string-array.name: slide_desc
string-array.item: Want to sell something that you do not need anymore? \n Or want to buy used products at a low price? \n Ask the community.
It is exhausting to walk around the city and find To lets.\nWorry no more, we got you covered!
Finding it hard to get a private tutor that you desire? \nWell check this app out...
This community is yours... \nFeel free to check out what others offering you.
